overview: Note to self: Ask Santa for glasses this year. When Piper accidentally mistook a gorgeous man resting outside her building for a homeless person in need of lunch, things got heated. She was only trying to do a good deed around the holidays, but he called her righteous. She called him something far worse. If only she didnâ€™t have to see him again. But fate has other plans.
title: The Merry Mistake
